answers.answer: Im due the 2nd, soooo over it!!! Everything is hard to do!
Im due the 7th! 16 days :) anxious to hold my baby girl!
I'm due the 13th of April but I'm being induced the 6th so 15 days left.

I'm scheduled to have my c-section on the 2nd of April.  I am SO done being pregnant with twins. I've gained 50 pounds and I have over ten pounds of baby, making getting comfortable completely impossible. I'm so scared for the operation but I just can't do this much longer. I'm looking forward to finally holding my babies.

Due April 13th but going to take baby at 39 weeks which will be April 6th...if not before having issues with swelling and blood pressure go back to my specialist tomorrow so we shall see...good luck to all you other mommies!!!!!
Im a ftm due in a week! So excited for all of us! We're all so blessed. Good luck ladies :)
I am due on April 17, not sure if is normal to feel out of breath n anxiety.  I get up open windows  to see if that  helps  but it doesnt.  Anyone felt that?

Claudian80 - I'm also experiencing shortness of breath which I hear is normal,and increased anxiety.  For me it seems like my increase in anxiety is coming from anticipating the birth of my babies.  I am stressing out more the closer I get.  I just try to do some cleaning, spend some time outside, and pet my dogs and it usually helps.

Mommabanielle, what i feel weird  is that  i am not thinking about anything.  I am sleeping  and all of a sudden  just wake up and feel i cannot  breath  and then axiety kicks  in. Thank  you. At least  i know  is normal. 4 more weeks to goHow long  you have

I'm 37+4 weeks ftm and glad I'm not the only one who finds it hard to breath a lot, my partner is so worried when I sleep for how fast I do breath and keeps telling me about it making me feel anxious, but i do I wake up feeling more exhausted I have preeclampsia and anemia to top it off and have actually lost weight during the pregnancy, I'll be glad when my baby boy is here safe and sound but I would rather wait till he's ready to come out he's due 10th April  we can put up with this for about 2 more weeks can't we... lol come on ladies we can do this, good luck to you all xx
yaaay we are almost there ladies 11 more days to go due April 4th so anxious to hold my baby boy after ten years of waiting for our last baby!
Almost there due 7th april.. 14 days left so excited to hold my little boy! Hope he decides to come sooooooon :) good luck mommys

Claudian80, I had anxiety like that in my first trimester.  It was really distressing to me because I hadn't experienced anxiety like it in over a year.  I think it was hormones for me at that point.  I'm not surprised that you panic a little when you wake up short of breath. When I lie down, one of my babies heads goes right under my ribs and makes breathing pretty hard but I think I've gotten used to it because it has been happening since around 26 weeks.  I am SO excited to be having my babies in 6 days!
Mommabanielle, thsnk you  for sharing your  experience,  what did you  do that  helped you, for the  past  days  i been sleeping  about  3.  4 hours  and  feel  so exhausted at  work.
15 more days.   I'm sick of feeling sweaty and stinky all the time.  Lol
Due April 6th can't do anything also I can't even tuck my two boys in bed BC when I bend over I am not able to breath what so ever

You're welcome, Claudian80. I'm sad to say that not much has helped my shortness of breath,or my sleeping. I did buy a body pillow and I have another three pillows that I put around me to help support my back and belly. It has helped me get a little more sleep, but with over ten pounds of baby resting on my bladder I get up about 8 times a night to pee. I  like to tell myself I'm just getting practice for when I'll be up all night with twins. ;) The thing that helped me relax through shortness of breath is kind of silly, I just take long breaths in and out while counting to 5 (or reciting a prayer), it always helps me fall back to  sleep. How far along are you? I wish I had more advice to offer for being tired at work, that must be really hard!

Mommabanielle you  have gave me an advise  or what is helping you. I appreciated. I am 36 weeks a 6days. I talked to my  dr and she  gave me unisom to help, i can't  work  with  only  sleeping 2 or 3 hours at night..

question: I have 11-15 days left so excited anyone else due soon and so over being pregnant..sick of my stomach getting in way lol and ankles fingers body swelling pains in crotch just over it and want to hold my sweet baby boy ....I've been through a lot to get my baby two misscarrages and one still born at 27 weeks and I'm almost there just want him out so ik he's safe and sound and in my arms ....good luck to all mamas to be and best wishes
title: so excited
